thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com
thread.title: Rebecca

author: Rebecca
title: Rebecca
text: When I had to call to check the status of my glasses, the representative I spoke with was very professional and informative. Many of the frames have to be back-ordered, but I didn't mind waiting to get what I wanted versus settling for something else at my doctor's office. The lenses were done perfectly whereas I had to return to my doctor's office twice last year to get my old pair corrected. Compared to my Optometrist, I spent about $100 less at FramesDirect for more expensive, better fitting frames. It took about 3 weeks from order to delivery.
